bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system to provide user created social networks in a distributed commerce system

abstract.p: A system to identify a relationship network in a commerce system includes a first transaction identification module automatically to identify a first and a second party in a commerce network between whom a transaction has been at least partially successfully completed and to identify such parties as having a first degree relationship with one another. A network transaction identification module automatically identifies for the first party, at least one second degree party within the commerce network with whom the second party has at least partially successfully completed a transaction and automatically to identify such a party as having a second degree relationship with the first party. A network compiling module stores, in a memory network, data identifying the relationship network comprised of the first party and second party as having a first degree relationship and the at least one second degree party as having a second degree relationship with the first party.

abstract.p: A system to identify a relationship network in a commerce system includes a first transaction identification module automatically to identify a first and a second party in a commerce network between whom a transaction has been at least partially successfully completed and to identify such parties as having a first degree relationship with one another. A network transaction identification module automatically identifies for the first party, at least one second degree party within the commerce network with whom the second party has at least partially successfully completed a transaction and automatically to identify such a party as having a second degree relationship with the first party. A network compiling module stores, in a memory network, data identifying the relationship network comprised of the first party and second party as having a first degree relationship and the at least one second degree party as having a second degree relationship with the first party. TM KIPO & WIPO 2008

A system to identify a relationship network in a commerce system includes a first transaction identification module automatically to identify a first and a second party in a commerce network between whom a transaction has been at least partially successfully completed and to identify such parties as having a first degree relationship with one another. A network transaction identification module automatically identifies for the first party, at least one second degree party within the commerce network with whom the second party has at least partially successfully completed a transaction and automatically to identify such a party as having a second degree relationship with the first party.

A network compiling module stores, in a memory network, data identifying the relationship network comprised of the first party and second party as having a first degree relationship and the at least one second degree party as having a second degree relationship with the first party.

L'invention concerne un système destiné à identifier un réseau de relations dans un système de commerce, qui comporte un premier module d'identification de transactions qui identifie automatiquement une première et une seconde parties dans un réseau de commerce entre lesquelles une transaction a été conclue au moins partiellement et avec succès et qui identifie ces parties comme ayant une relation de premier degré l'une avec l'autre. Un module d'identification de transactions en réseau identifie automatiquement pour la première partie, au moins une partie de second degré dans le réseau de commerce avec laquelle la seconde partie a conclu au moins partiellement et avec succès une transaction et identifie automatiquement une telle partie comme ayant une relation de second degré avec la première partie.

Un module de compilation de réseau stocke, dans un réseau mémoire, des données identifiant le réseau de relations constitué de la première et de la seconde parties comme ayant une relation de premier degré et les parties de second degré comme ayant une relation de second degré avec la première partie.

A system to identify a relationship network in a commerce system includes a first transaction identification module automatically to identify a first and a second party in a commerce network between whom a transaction has been at least partially successfully completed and to identify such parties as having a first degree relationship with one another. A network transaction identification module automatically identifies for the first party, at least one second degree party within the commerce network with whom the second party has at least partially successfully completed a transaction and automatically to identify such a party as having a second degree relationship with the first party. A network compiling module stores relationship identification data in a memory network.

L'invention concerne un système destiné à identifier un réseau de relations dans un système de commerce, qui comporte un premier module d'identification de transactions qui identifie automatiquement une première et une seconde parties dans un réseau de commerce entre lesquelles une transaction a été conclue au moins partiellement et avec succès et qui identifie ces parties comme ayant une relation de premier degré l'une avec l'autre. Un module d'identification de transactions en réseau identifie automatiquement pour la première partie, au moins une partie de second degré dans le réseau de commerce avec laquelle la seconde partie a conclu au moins partiellement et avec succès une transaction et identifie automatiquement une telle partie comme ayant une relation de second degré avec la première partie.

Un module de compilation de réseau stocke, dans un réseau mémoire, des données identifiant le réseau de relations constitué de la première et de la seconde parties comme ayant une relation de premier degré et les parties de second degré comme ayant une relation de second degré avec la première partie.
